title: About Our Central Kentucky Law Firm | Skeeters, Bennett, Wilson & Humphrey
text: For more than 50 years, Skeeters, Bennett, Wilson & Humphrey has been one of the most respected law firms in the region. We enjoy a hard-earned reputation as a law firm serving serious clients who expect serious results. Our firm serves clients throughout Central Kentucky, including Hardin County, Meade County, LaRue County, Breckinridge County, and Grayson County. The world is getting more complicated, and it’s changing all the time. Keeping up with that change is a constant challenge, and that’s also true in the practice of law. Our firm rises to that challenge discovering new opportunities for success. But while the law has evolved, what hasn’t changed is our ability to understand it and work to solve serious client problems — time and time again. This is Skeeters, Bennett, Wilson & Humphrey’s philosophy. Quite simply, we enjoy getting positive results for our clients. It’s what we look forward to each day. A Commitment to Our Clients The attorneys of Skeeters, Bennett, Wilson & Humphrey are highly experienced and fully committed to providing quality legal representation in a wide variety of practice areas – including personal injury, estate planning, and probate law. We also handle cases involving real estate and business or institutional services. When you need a serious law firm, you can turn to us. The attorneys of Skeeters, Bennett, Wilson & Humphrey practice at all levels of both state and federal courts in Kentucky. With our collective experience and strong familiarity with Kentucky laws, we will represent your interests with professional excellence and sound judgment. Contact us today to schedule a consultation.
